mapper.select: SELECT l.ID, l.NAME, l.USER_NAME, l.STARTS, l.CREATE_DATE, l.UPDATE_DATE, GROUP_CONCAT(r.`NAME`) AS roleNames FROM login l LEFT JOIN (select LOGIN_ID,ROLES_ID from login_roles) lr ON l.ID = lr.LOGIN_ID LEFT JOIN role r ON lr.ROLES_ID = R.ID GROUP BY l.ID ORDER BY l.NAME DESC,l.CREATE_DATE ASC

SELECT , , GROUP_CONCAT(r.`NAME`) AS roleNames, GROUP_CONCAT(lr.CREATE_DATE) AS lrCreateDates, GROUP_CONCAT(lr.UPDATE_DATE) AS lrUpdateDates, GROUP_CONCAT(lr.CREATOR) AS lcReators, GROUP_CONCAT(lr.MODIFIER) AS lrModifiers FROM login l LEFT JOIN user u ON l.ID = u.ID LEFT JOIN login_roles lr ON l.ID = lr.LOGIN_ID LEFT JOIN role r ON lr.ROLES_ID = R.ID WHERE l.ID = #{userId} GROUP BY l.ID ORDER BY l.NAME DESC,l.CREATE_DATE ASC
